text: William Lee Rausch is an American drummer. He played in many thrash metal bands in the 1980s. == Career == === Megadeth === in 1983, Rausch joined Megadeth, a band made by Dave Mustaine. In 1984, he played the drums for Last Rites, which had three songs on it. Afterwards, Rausch left the band, and was replaced by Gar Samuelson. Category:Living people Category:American drummers Category:Megadeth members Category:1964 births
title: Lee Rausch
